summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Pike Street from the West margin of 7th Avenue to Boylston Avenue in the City of Seattle, by paving & curbing under Ordinance No. 12175, creating Local Improvement District No. 1049 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
